abstract: Letter from British Ambassador Nigel Sheinwald comments on Oct 15 editorial about Britain's austerity budget.
snippet: Britain’s ambassador responds to a recent editorial about the austerity measures his country has taken.
lead_paragraph: Britain’s ambassador responds to a recent editorial about the austerity measures his country has taken.

headline.main: Britain’s Economic Plan: The Ambassador’s View
headline.print_headline: Britain’s Economic Plan: The Ambassador’s View
headline.seo: Britain’s Economic Plan: The Ambassador’s View
